column4: don't you mean x86-64, amd64 and intel 64 are used to refer to 64-bit x86?
I already covered amd64,  intel 64 is used more often to refer to intel's 64 bit processors specifically
i'm going by industry terms... Intel 64 is what they're calling their implementation of amd64, perhaps you're thinking of IA-64 that they used for Itanium?
